item.title: C++ Tips
item.description: C++ Tips # Templates # A template is a simple yet very powerful tool in C++. The simple idea is to pass the data type as a parameter so that we donâ€™t need to write the same code for different data types. For example, a software company may need to sort() for different data types. Rather than writing and maintaining multiple codes, we can write one sort() and pass the datatype as a parameter.
